title: Riot, I love Taliyah's special interactions

embed.description: The Special/Hidden/Secret Interactions for the new champion Taliyah Shows all the specific taunts, item buys etc Taliyah has. Stay upto date with information by following me on twitter: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights This video is 100% accurate at the time of creation, PBE is constantly changing so things might change in a couple patches.

body:
She has reactions to things I didn't know you could have quotes for. Like popping a potion, responding to ally/enemy jokes, attacking someone in river/jungle, etc. That's really cool, I love to see the technology for creating champions improve. Hope to see more interactions like this in the future.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Glad you like them! Taliyah responding to jokes is my favorite new VO trigger. I'm pretty sure the attack lines that are unique to areas on the map are new too. The hope is that including more lines like this will help make the characters feel more organic and alive, while also mixing up the play experience a little bit every time.
CAN THE ENEMY HEAR HER DISS THEIR JOKES?
Yea, so they can eventually feel like they're talking freely in the future. I like this direction so much.:P
I love her lines... except the boots and belts ones. Was it really necessary to make her a stereotypical sassy teenager?
So, mind explaining her response to Ekko? Any chance she'll be taking a trip to Zaun?
Y'know, just going to say this: If a male champion had made comments to female champions like Taliyah does to Ezreal and Taric, we'd have a shitstorm about "muh objectification."
Tahm's is actually pretty savage.

{{champion:33}} ok
_Taliyah dies laughing_
Upvote for Taliyah's ladyboner for Ekko, Taric, and Braum.
Pretty sure she see's Braum as a father-figure.
Don't we all?
You don't discuss Goat's Milk with your dad.
You do if you are from a family of shepherds and you had to milk the goats.
hot

Talking shit to the emperor?

HERESY

Does Taliyah have a crush on Ekko :3 "Did the Earth move for you too? Did I just say that out loud?"

"Are Icathians secrets truly the key?" "Tell us what we need to stand against those creatures" Quotes to Kass. Oh man oh man! This is only hyping up a future Void lore event even more! "You breed chaos like a rabid Rabid Ralsiji" to Rek'Sai - the hell is a Ralsiji? 

I also like how supportive of Nasus she is. The Frejlord lines are also pretty cool.

You'll find Ralsiji info in here:

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/creative-spotlight/reksai-scourge-desert

TL;DR they're the huge pack animals featured on the Shurima site's background art.

> [{quoted}](name=Placentas,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rzeyxw4A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-07T00:43:00.672+0000)
>
> the hell is a Ralsiji?

That's exactly what I said! JAREDAN PLZ HELP
omg i main ekko and if that was a yes........................... IM GOING TO BUY HER AND MAIN HER.... SORRY JINX {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Action without vision is a nightmare
Action without vision=Low Elo 
Low Elo=Nightmare Confirmed
"Sedimentary, My dear Malphite" - I died

Taliyah:_ "We have prospered without you."_
Azir:_ "Said no one ever."_

What possible negatives could Azir bring to Shurima besides the attention of other nations?

I don't see how Shurima has benefited with him being gone, so far all we know of the land is that everything sucks. Nothing good has been said about the land besides what it's desert testing people and many of those people go mad  I.E. Malzahar.

Seems like the closest thing any rebellion against Azir would be those who are aware of his awkward relationship with Xerath not the common people, they seem to only benefit with his return in every way.

{{item:3100}} "Huh. Towers are stone, too. Interesting."

Dayum~!
Sounds like Rammus might have some issues... or she thinks hes just weird.

"Did the earth move for you too? Did I just say that out loud?"

Taliyah x Ekko confirm

People Getting mad about Taliyah throwing Shade at Azir: Xerath's Betrayal happened within MINUTES of Azir's Decree abolishing Slavery and Naming Xerath his honored Brother.

And then the ENTIRE EMPIRE Exploded.

Obviously, anyone who survived probably didn't get the memo that the Slaves had all been freed
Warwick is a sheep in wolf's clothing?  So he's not as dangerous as he seems?
I think that's a reference to how he was once this mad scientist who never physically fought and now he's a wolfman
Likely that he's a coward who plays at being something fearsome.

>First moves on Crystal Scar

gg rito, well played
now give me more info.

they are making a "definitely not dominion mode" that is an updated crystal scar and adding it to the rotation mode.
Its [all right here past the Taliyah stuff ](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/05/55-pbe-update.html#more)
She REALLY REALLY REALLY despises Azir. Also Taunts worked, I just want to smack her more and more with each.

It seems like from what Azir and Xerath's full bio say is that Xerath murdered practically the whole area and left maybe a few around to tell tales passed thru millena. And she seems to see Nasus as a friend.
Arya Stark at 11:39 !! {{champion:114}}
It's weird how much the last three champions and reworks have ended up talking as much as Smite champions.
I love that her and Braum have so much in common XD, I feel they would make great friends
Her voice is completely fitting but i hate it's sound

"Boys can be pretty too, right?"
{{champion:81}}: Uhh... NO!!!!
So critical of Azir, the misconceptions are strong in this one.
Damnit Taliyah stop throwing shade at your majestic Bird God. HE'S A NICE GUY JUST SIT DOWN AND TALK TO HIM.
Am I the only one who feels Taliyah is a bit pretentious?
Anyone else noticed how her sleeves phase through her dress-thingy when she jumps on and off the rock?

I-KAY-thee-uh? 

How did you get the pronunciation of Icathia wrong?
YOU LIKE GOATS MILK! I LIKE GOATS MILK!
